account.remove_alert_msg:
Are you sure to remove your account?
 Your data will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered. Remember to save your data first.
 Press OK to continue to remove your account...
account.name_errors_minlength: First name must be at least 2 characters long.
account.lastName_errors_minlength: Last name must be at least 3 characters long.
account.phone_errors_pattern:
Phone format must be regular. 
 Example 999-999-9999.
account.newpassword_errors_minlength: Password must be at least 5 elements long.
account.newpassword_errors_pattern:
Password must have letters
(both uppercase and lowercase)
 and numbers validation.

account.delete_account_message: Are you sure you want to delete the account?
